objects.text:
• Spacious Stylish Design
• Ample Storage Space
• Durable Synthetic Material
• Gold Hardware Accents

product_details.description: ALDO womens Durable handbag This spaciously stylish tote bag boasts ample storage space and shoulder strap for extra utility Made of synthetic materials 1 compartment: stylish and functional to store your cell phone, wallet, or any other essential you need near by Medium: the perfect medium sized handbag for everyday life Size: 10.9'' L x 4'' W x 12.4'' H (28cm x 10.5cm x 32cm) Fabric type - Faux Leather ** Origin - Imported ** Closure type - Zipper ** Lining - Synthetic ** Country of Origin - Cambodia **

banner_details:
This elegantly styled banner features a luxury handbag promotional layout with a clean and minimal design. It is split horizontally with a light cream upper background and a warm muted brown lower section. Rounded graphic elements and faint grid lines add subtle sophistication. The main visual focus is the central handbag image ("product_image"), highlighted with soft shadows to enhance its premium look.

Key text elements include a bold brand name ("heading") and subheading ("subheading") at the top-left, followed by a feature description list ("description"). A soft serif tagline in the upper-right ("tagline") emphasizes luxury. At the bottom-left, the price ("price") is boldly displayed above a rounded rectangular call-to-action ("cta_background" and "cta").

**Color Palette:**
- Cream White: `#F6EFE4` (background)
- Cocoa Brown: `#7D5A50` (text and button)
- Warm Beige: `#BA8D75` (divider section)
- Bronze/Peach Tint: `#D8A98B`, `#A47C69`, `#D49773` (decorative and accent text)
product_color: The product image features a sophisticated handbag in a warm, muted camel brown color (#B88A6D), which dominates the visual space, offering elegance and neutrality. The surface has a subtle textured pattern that gives depth and refinement. Accents in polished metallic gold (#D4AF37) highlight the hardware, charms, and brand logo, adding a luxurious and eye-catching contrast. The warm tones are seamlessly blended, with the gold elements standing out while complementing the main color. For an advertisement banner, a color palette including camel brown (#B88A6D), metallic gold (#D4AF37), soft beige (#F5EBDD), and ivory white (#FFFFFF) would maintain elegance and sophistication.
